tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP We)) (VP (VBP have) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB stop) (SBAR (IN like) (S (NP (DT every) (NN half) (NN hour)) (VP (VB cause) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP$ my) (NN bladder)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN size)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT a) (NN peanut))))))))))))))))
